document_data.name: Ghorashk
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghorashk''' was one of the commanders of the [[Hordes of Dragonspear (army)|fiendish horde]] that assaulted the [[Sword Coast]] during the [[Second Dragonspear War]] of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The leader was in charge of [[the Storm]], a division of a hundred [[bugbear]]s that fought alongside [[ogre]]s and the [[black dragon]], [[Maelestor Rex]].
document_data.Personality: He was a devious and savage individual, willing to do whatever it took to win, whether on the battlefield or in his life.
document_data.History:
Ghorashk gained his level of power within the Dragonspear horde after murdering his previous superiors.

In the {{YearlinkName|1363}}, Ghorashk and his forces fought in the final battle of the war at the site of [[Dragonspear Castle]].
